modName: River ENB - A natural realistic and saturated ENB
summary: An ENB with the aim to make Skyrim look realistic and beautiful at the same time :)
descriptionHtml:
[font=Trebuchet MS][youtube]OlJt-lEdZe0[/youtube][youtube]3QavnychpPU[/youtube]
[b][color=#6aa84f][size=5][u]Installation:[/u][/size][/color][/b]

[/font][list][*][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#f4f4f4][size=3]get [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51033/?]EWIs High [/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51033/?%EF%BB%BF]SkyrimPrefs[/url]﻿﻿
[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#f4f4f4][size=3]Set fxaa to 1 in SkyrimPrefs.ini
[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#f4f4f4][size=3]set "bDoDepthOfField=1" in SkyrimPrefs.ini if you want to use "Realistic Water Two"
[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#f4f4f4]Right click SkyrimPrefs.ini, select "Properties", and check [/color][/font]"Read-only" under Attributes [/size][/*]
[/list][list][*][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#f4f4f4]drag "d3d9.dll" and "enbhost.exe" from the „WrapperVersion“ folder from this [/color][/font]file [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0254.html]http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0254.html[/url] to you Skyrim folder (programs(x86)/steam/steamapps/common/skyrim)[/size][/*]
[/list][list][*][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#f4f4f4]install [/color][/font][color=#1e84cc][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52423/?][font=Trebuchet MS]"Pure Weather[/font][font=Trebuchet MS]﻿"[/font]﻿[/url]﻿[/color][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#f4f4f4][/color][/font]
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#f4f4f4]install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?﻿]"ELFX"[/url]﻿[/color][/font][/size][/*]
[*][size=3]install RiverENB.rar by extracting all files that are in there to your Skyrim folder[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]open enblocal.ini in your Skyrim folder and search for where it says: VideoMemorySizeMb=4096  // ENTER YOUR VRAM+RAM-2048[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]scroll down to see how to enable the extra effects for better vibrence, better black and white and much more[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]set the Ingame Brightness so it looks good on your monitor![/size][/*]
[/list][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#f4f4f4]

[/color][/font][color=#6aa84f][size=5][b][u]Optional: (for Parallax Water)[/u][/b][/size][/color][list][*][size=3]install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/?]"Realistic Water Two"[/url]﻿[font=Trebuchet MS][color=#f4f4f4], also install the ENB textures from the Download section[/color][/font][/size][/*]
[*][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][color=#f4f4f4]install [/color][color=#00ff00][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48938/?﻿]"Watercolor for ENB"[/url]﻿[/color][color=#93c47d] [/color][/size][/font][/*]
[/list]
[size=6][color=#ffff00]Have FUN! :)[/color]
[/size]
[color=#f4f4f4]Please contact me if you´re having trouble or tell me if I forgot to mention some things for the installation :)[/color]

[color=#ffff00][size=5][i]You want your Skyrim to look exactly like the screenshots?[/i][/size][/color]
[color=#ffff00][size=5]Here´s what you need:[/size][/color]

[list][*][size=2]First go to your Skyrim.ini in your Documents/My Games/Skyrim and change iMinGrassSize to 120 for best performance or 75 for the best look (you may have to uncheck "read only" before you do that, but change it back on when you´re finished)[/size][/*]
[*][color=#6aa84f][size=4]Now install these mods:[/size][/color][/*]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?]Skyrim Flora Overhaul[/url]﻿ (any "main file" version you want)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33582/?]Grass on Steroids[/url]﻿ for SFO <-- important[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42492/?]Realistic Sun for Climates of Tamriel and Vanilla[/url]﻿ ENB EDITION <-- important[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655/?]SMIM[/url]﻿
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35708/?]Horizon of Dreams[/url]﻿
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/607/?]Skyrim HD - 2K Textures[/url]﻿
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49344/?]Vivid Landscapes[/url]﻿
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]aMidianBorn Book of Silence[/url]﻿
[/size][/*]
[/list]
[b][color=#0000ff][size=5]For the use of the new effects:[/size][/color]
[list][*][size=4]Press Shift+Enter and edit the effect.txt[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]It´s most important that you first enable "black level", "contrast" and "vibrence" in the upper left corner[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Feel free to play around with the settings, by pressing "apply changes" you can reset to your latest save[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Here are my settings: (save your configuration when you´re finished)[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2][img]http://i.imgur.com/0KgxAh8.jpg[/img][/size]
[/b]

==============================================================================================================================
[font=Arial][color=#f1c232][size=5][b][u][center]Credits:[/center]
[/u][/b][/size][/color][/font]
[center]Boris Vorontsov for his amazing programming skills
Kyokushinoyama for the excellent sunsprite shader
bronze316 for the trusted Depth of Field effects
prod80 for stunning sun textures
ewi65 for the tweaked Bokeh Depth of Field[/center]

[color=#6aa84f][size=5][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/56725-1-1407265646.jpg[/img]﻿[/size][/color]
author: Mariusbababubu

files.name: RiverENB 2.0
files.changelogHtml:
New Post-Process Effects for perfect black and white
New Post-Process Effect: Blur, Contrast, Vibrence and Sharpening
